cast.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.
cast.title: The Batman

details.biography: Tiago Martins is a Portuguese actor born on the 24th of January 1997. He graduated from the University of Exeter with a First in Drama in 2018. Based in London and South-West England. Training through workshop lessons with Royal Shakespeare Company and Splendid Assembly. Involved in TV, Stage and Film as well as commercial work.
details.name: Tiago Martins
